name: getstatsbyday
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trinidad_covid_19_statistics.
Tool description: This API provides Covid-19 statistics by year, month, day and most recent day in Trinidad and Tobago
API description: This endpoint fetches Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics by  day. For a valid response, the months are input as "01" or "12" and not the actual month name such as "January" or "December". Th e days are entered in the similar format as months ie "01" -"31" and not actual days such as "Thursday" or "Monday",

monthid.description: The month identifier in "MM" format (e.g., "01" for January).

dayid.description: The day identifier in "DD" format (e.g., "01" for the 1st day of the month).
